data.title: Frank Castillo
data.meta_description: Learn more about Frank Castillo, MD, a provider caring for adults at our One Medical practice in Chicago, IL.
data.text:
I enjoy collaborating with patients on their health concerns and aspirations, guiding them to make informed decisions that align with their current needs. My focus lies particularly in preventive healthcare, supporting individuals in managing chronic conditions such as diabetes and hypertension, and recognizing the significance of mental and spiritual wellness in overall health and happiness.

Goes by

Frank

Pronouns

He, him, his

How I stay healthy and happy

I enjoy exploring the city on my bike, savoring quality time with my wife, socializing with friends, and actively participating in my spiritual community at Old St. Patrickâ€™s Church in Chicago.

Education

University of Wisconsin Medical School, Madison, WI

Residency

University of Wisconsin School of Medicine Family Medicine, WI

Board certification

American Board of Family Medicine (ABFM)
